title: Planning to join PESU, need guidance
content: Hi Guys, i am planning to join MCA in PESU , just wanted info from people who have joined here, is it good and are the placements at par with Btech CSE level or is it average, any info would be highly appreciated.

comments.body: As a BTech student I've never even seen a MCA student in any placements. It might be that they have seperate placements. I'd recommend you directly ask PES for placements statistics.

When I was going through placements the salary difference by a company between BTech CSE and MTech/MCA used to be about 40%; 40% lower that is.  The BTech degree is valued at a much much higher level than the MTech and MCA degrees

  
So I would suggest against joining PESU

Placements stats are really bad this year at pes 
Don't depend on the university
Try getting a job by applying outside
